site_name: Fulham Gas WorksImperial RoadLondon
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-Material Amendment to Reserved Matters Application (Ref: 2022/00559/RES) dated 22 July 2022, for the "Reserved Matters Application relating to the approval of access; appearance; landscaping; layout and scale in respect of Phase 3c and 3d (Development Plot E2) for the erection of a building comprising residential and non-residential floorspace with associated landscaping, in compliance with Condition 1 (Reserved Matters details), Condition 4 (Outline Component Drawings) and Condition 5 (Design Codes, Development Specification and Parameter Plans) of planning permission 2018/02100/COMB granted 08 February 2019 (a comprehensive residential led mixed use redevelopment of the former Gasworks Site)" with amendments sought to Condition 1 (Drawings). Amendments include; separation of vertical escape routes between residential floors and basement; provision of ventilated lobbies to all corridors and sterilised lift lobbies; inclusion of wheelchair refuges in all lift lobbies; adjustments to building elevations to accommodate changes to entrances, access arrangements and provision of new escape doors. These amendments are required in line with Health and Safety Executive guidance relating to fire safety. Further changes comprise; plant room egress routes revised, water feature plant room amended, parking numbers updated, and reduction of B2 basement.
